word: BESIDE THE FEW TESTIMONIES WHICH WERE PRINTED, MANY PERSONAL TESTIMONIES WERE SENT TO INDIVIDUALS AND OFTENTIMES SISTER WHITE WOULD WRITE SAYING, "I HAVE NO ONE TO COPY THIS TESTIMONY. PLEASE MAKE A COPY FOR YOURSELF AND SEND THE ORIGINAL BACK TO ME." AS A RESULT OF THIS METHOD OF WORK, WE HAVE IN OUR MANUSCRIPT VAULT MANY OF THE EARLY TESTIMONIES IN SISTER WHITE'S HANDWRITING.
